resources.string: Basically 24H planner with Alarm separated in tow parts:
First part allows you to start random tasks and the app will follow the progress of each one and notify you when time is up
Second part organize your daily tasks and notify you when you should start one of your tasks, and at the end of each task

string.name: rdpart
string.i: This is initial version we are preparing more futures, enjoy !

resources.string: We had to integrate some ads inside the app so we can grow a bit and add more futures.
if we found good support form Donation we will remove ads next updates
